page.title: 10SITES OF INTEREST
page.content: On{this,}and the{next, page there are brief notes on{local sites {of interest.}These are the{Helm (SD {531887), former watermills}and the {Quaker Burial Ground at Birkrigg (SD {538865). {THE HELM {The Helm}is a rocky ridge overlooking{Oxenholme village}from whence it is{easily climbed.}It can also be reached from{A65(SD 527889)}by means of a{short,}but{fairly steep {climb.}The{Ordnance Survey column on the{summit}of the{Helm}commands an {extensive view,}which, on a{clear day, includes{Kendal,}the{Lakeland fells, {Morecambe Bay}and{Blackpool Tower. {Nearer}at hand,{signs}of a{hill fort dating from{pre-Roman}times may be {discerned.
